description: TEHRAN - Hezbollah highlighted its military prowess and startled Israel into a state of panic by carrying out a surprise drone attack on a military base near the port city of Haifa on Sunday night.
title: Drone delivery

description: TEHRAN – The President of Iran highlighted the importance of bilateral collaboration to mitigate regional tensions during a discussion with Azerbaijan's deputy prime minister.
title: Pezeshkian stresses importance of regional cooperation in meeting with Azeri official

description: TEHRAN – The arrest and subsequent travel ban imposed on Jewish-American investigative journalist Jeremy Loffredo by Israeli authorities has exposed the hypocrisy of U.S. politicians' platitudes on press freedom.
title: Jeremy Loffredo: another journalist silenced by Israel

description: The International Court of Justice (ICJ), in its Legal Consequences of the Construction of a Wall in the Occupied Palestinian Territory advisory opinion issued in 2004, explicitly declared the clear incompatibility of the Israeli regime’s actions with fundamental principles of international law.
title: The legitimacy of defending resistance in international law

description: MOSCOW – On October 11th, Russian President Vladimir Putin and Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian met in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. Their meeting took place on the sidelines of the "Interrelation of Times and Civilizations—the Basis of Peace and Development" forum, held in honor of the 300th anniversary of the birth of Turkmen poet and philosopher Makhtumkuli Fragi.
title: Putin and Pezeshkian’s meeting in Ashgabat

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Maoud Pezeshkian highlighted his administration’s economic and international priorities and plans during a Monday meeting with the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
title: Economy, foreign relations take center stage in president’s weekly meeting with Leader

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Kayhan discussed the failure and desperation of the Zionist regime in view of the development in the West Asia region.
title: The message of Iranian authority from Tehran to the heart of Beirut

description: TEHRAN – Foreign ministers of the European Union have approved a fresh round of sanctions targeting seven Iranian individuals and seven entities, accusing Tehran of supplying ballistic missiles to Russia for use in the Ukraine conflict.
title: Europe sanctions Iranian airlines, officials over refuted claims of missile transfer to Russia

description: TEHRAN- Last week, the Israeli right-wing Channel 14, closely aligned with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, published a photo of Iraq’s Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani as a potential assassination target.
title: Anger mounts in Iraq over Israeli threats to Ayatollah Sistani

description: TEHRAN – Following Hezbollah's Saturday strike on an Israeli military base in occupied territory, a high-ranking Iranian official, a former commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps and a member of the Expediency Council, has warned that "challenging days" are ahead for Israel.
title: Ex-IRGC chief says ‘tough days ahead of Israel’ after Hezbollah drone strike

description: TEHRAN- Medics say at least four Palestinians were burned alive and 40 others sustained severe burn injuries after the Israeli military bombed a tent camp for the displaced in the Gaza Strip.
title: Palestinians burned alive in central Gaza

description: TEHRAN – The reported deployment of American military personnel to operate Terminal High Altitude Area Defence (THAAD) systems in Israel, a move under consideration by the Biden administration, has once again thrust Israel's actions onto the centre stage of tensions in West Asia.
title: U.S. THAAD gamble: Moving up the escalation ladder

description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah resistance movement has launched a retaliatory attack on the Israeli naval base in Haifa, amid the regime's ongoing aggression against Lebonan.
title: Hezbollah hits Israeli naval base in Haifa

description: BEIRUT - Despite the torrent of claims by the Zionists that Hezbollah has been dismantled and its military capabilities have been drastically weakened following the “Pager & Walkie-Talkie Massacre”, the assassination of the commanders of Al-Rodwan Force and the movement’s leader Sayyed Nasrallah along with his senior consultants,  Hezbollah targeted - with a squadron of attack drones - a camp for the Golani Brigades in Binyamina, south of Haifa with the cry: “We are at your service, o Sayyed Nasrallah.”
title: Hezbollah humiliates Golani: “Israel is weaker than a spider’s web”

description: TEHRAN – Iranian intelligence forces have successfully apprehended two terror cells linked to the notorious Jaish al-Adl group, preventing planned attacks in the southeastern province of Sistan and Baluchestan.
title: Intelligence forces arrest two terror groups in SE Iran

description: TEHRAN – The foreign ministers of Iran and Oman have called for swift international intervention to halt what they describe as Israeli genocide and aggressive actions in Gaza and Lebanon.
title: Tehran, Muscat urge immediate international action to end Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs denounced the unlawful act and egregious crime committed by the Zionist regime in the assassination of Major General Abbas Nilforushan, underscoring the need for accountability for this violent action.
title: Iran vows to hold Israel accountable for assassination of IRGC commander Abbas Nilforushan

description: TEHRAN – The commander of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) Aerospace Division has expressed gratitude to the Iranian people for their messages of support, following Iran's Operation True Promise II, which saw missile strikes against Israeli military bases in the occupied territories.
title: IRGC commander expresses gratitude for nation's backing of Operation True Promise II

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Defense Minister, Major General Aziz Nasir Zadeh, has highlighted that the Israeli regime is in decline and has suffered significant setbacks at the hands of the Axis of Resistance.
title: ‘Resistance will defeat Israel as it did in 2006’: Iran DM

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Vice President Mohammad Reza Aref is set to travel to Islamabad to attend an upcoming summit of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO), according to the deputy head of International Affairs and Regional Cooperation of the Iranian Presidential Office.
title: Iran VP to visit Pakistan for SCO summit

description: TEHRAN-The play “The Murder at Haversham Manor” written by Susie H. K. Brideswell will be performed at the Divar Art Home in Tehran from October 27 to November 12.
title: Divar Art Home to stage “The Murder at Haversham Manor”

description: TEHRAN- American filmmaker Woody Allen’s 2013 movie “Blue Jasmine” was reviewed during a session at the Arasbaran Cultural Center in Tehran on Sunday.
title: Tehran cultural center reviews Woody Allen’s “Blue Jasmine”

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short film “Alone Together” directed by Omid Mirzaei received an Honorable Mention at the 47th LUCAS International Festival for Young Film Lovers which was held in Frankfurt, Germany, from October 3 to 10.
title: “Alone Together” honored at Germany’s LUCAS International Festival

description: TEHRAN- As the world reflects on Children’s Day, celebrated on October 8 to honor the laughter, dreams, and innocence of children, the stark reality in Gaza casts a long shadow over this global festivity.
title: Gaza's grief: Israel's strikes silence innocent souls, young lives

description: TEHRAN-Veteran Iranian vocalist Aminollah Rashidi died of natural causes in Tehran on Friday at 99.
title: Veteran vocalist Aminollah Rashidi passes away at 99

description: TEHRAN - The best Canoe Polo teams are ready to fight for top honors as the 2024 International Canoe Federation Canoe Polo World Championships begins in Deqing, China on Tuesday.
title: Iranian teams learn fate at ICF Canoe Polo World Championships

description: TEHRAN - The legal boundaries and protective regulations for the Viranshahr archaeological site in northeastern Iran have been officially determined and announced by the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts.
title: Legal boundaries set for Viranshahr archaeological site

description: TEHRAN - The 9th edition of the UN World Forum on Gastronomy Tourism will take place in Manama, Bahrain, from November 18 to 19.
title: Bahrain to host UN World Forum on gastronomy tourism

description: A group of Russian scientists has presented a new study on a large burial mound previously discovered in southern Siberia.
title: Scientists shed new light on findings from Scythian burial site

description: TEHRAN - Qazvin province has experienced a 13 percent increase in the number of visits to its tourist attractions during the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (started on March 20), compared to the same period last year.
title: Qazvin sees 13% rise in tourist visits in H1

description: TEHRAN - Ali Darabi, Iran’s deputy minister for cultural heritage, has expressed optimism about the potential of the 11th-century Bersian mosque to earn a UNESCO World Heritage designation.
title: Bersian Mosque well qualified for UNESCO status, official suggests

description: TEHRAN - Recent reports of a subway tunnel being constructed near the tomb of Persian poet Hafez in Shiraz have sparked concern among cultural heritage enthusiasts and experts, who fear the project could pose a threat to the historical site.
title: Concerns raised over subway construction near Hafez’s tomb in Shiraz

description: TEHRAN –A total of 453 out of 938 Iranian researchers who have been placed among the world's top one percent most-cited researchers are affiliated with medical universities, a significant increase compared to the past two years.
title: Most-cited researchers affiliated with medical universities sharply rise

description: TEHRAN – Iran national football team forward Mehdi Taremi says that the win against Qatar in the AFC Asian Qualifiers - Road to 26 will pave their way to secure their place in the 2026 World Cup.
title: Taremi looks for win against Qatar in 2026 World Cup qualifier

description: TEHRAN – Observed annually on October 15, International Day of Rural Women highlights rural women’s critical role in food production, environmental conservation, and sustainable agriculture.
title: Rural women ‘agents of change’

description: TEHRAN –A total of 12 Iranian knowledge-based firms are attending the 44th edition of the Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (GITEX) 2024 from October 14 to 18 in Dubai Trade Center, the UAE.
title: Knowledge-based delegation attending GITEX 2024

description: BEIRUT- Active resistance against American hegemony in West Asia has reached a critical point, posing a genuine threat to American regional interests. For some time, the U.S. underestimated the power balance that had shifted in favor of the Axis of Resistance.
title: The resistance has yet to reveal all its capabilities

description: TEHRAN –Attending the 14th meeting of BRICS Ministers of Health, Alireza Raeisi, the deputy health minister, proposed adopting a child-centered, rather than adult-centered, approach in addressing non-communicable diseases, which was well received by BRICS member states.
title: BRICS welcomes Iran’s proposal on NCDs

description: TEHRAN- Iran exported $207 million of tomatoes in the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Tomato export stands at $207m in 6 months

description: TEHRAN – The governor of the Central Bank of Iran (CBI) has said Iran is going to become a member of the New Development Bank, formerly referred to as the BRICS Development Bank, IRIB reported.
title: Iran plans to become a member of BRICS Development Bank

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s thermal power plants generated over 193 million megawatt-hours (MWh) of electricity in the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), registering a new record high.
title: Thermal power plants’ output breaks new record in H1

description: TEHRAN - The 3rd Iran Energy Efficiency Conference and Exhibition (IREEC 2024) kicked off at Milad Tower Conference Center on Monday.
title: Tehran hosting energy efficiency exhibition, conference

description: TEHRAN - The new secretary of Iran’s Free Zones High Council has said that improving business environment should be the main priority in the country’s free commercial-industrial and special economic zones, IRNA reported.
title: Improving business environment, a priority of free zones in Iran

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran’s Trade Promotion Organization (TPO) has criticized the imbalance in the country’s exports and imports and said the TPO is taking new measures to reduce the imbalance in the country’s foreign trade.
title: TPO plans to take new measures to reduce foreign trade imbalance
Beirut and Gunpowder Episode 03

description: TEHRAN - Iran's national football team will face off against Qatar in a crucial match on Tuesday as both sides continue their quest to qualify for the 2026 FIFA World Cup.
title: Iran to face Qatar in 2026 FIFA World Cup quest

description: A large number of families in the city of Qazvin got together on Friday, October 11, flying kites to mark National Children’s Week.
title: Families get together for kite festival
